summary: Diff implements several UI styling changes across user dashboard components and admin settings, including distinct System Settings tab colors and a colored primary button in Worker Rate Settings. However, evidence is insufficient that all requested admin primary action buttons (especially System Settings Save/Submit actions) were updated, and several unrelated view styling changes appear added beyond the stated requirements.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add attractive, non-gray colors to Admin panel primary action buttons (Save/Submit/Add) in Settings and Rate sections, and audit other admin sections to ensure their primary action buttons are not colorless.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff clearly colors the Worker Rate Settings primary 'Add' button, but the System Settings Save buttons (Branding/Labels/Notice/Admin Credentials) are not shown in the truncated diff, so there is no evidence they were styled. The requirement also asks to audit other admin sectionsâ€™ primary actions; the provided admin section diffs (e.g., Nasta/Payment-Loan) are truncated before showing primary buttons, so button styling cannot be verified.

hallucinated_features.description: SupportView UI styling overhaul (header gradients, card borders, typography adjustments) not explicitly requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on user dashboard KPI/action tiles, user/friend text sizing, and admin System Settings tabs/buttons. Support inbox styling is not mentioned as in-scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Profile settings view styling adjustments (header gradients, card typography, layout tweaks) not explicitly requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention profile settings; REQ-3 refers to 'user/friend' related sections, and this change appears broader than that scope based on the diff snippet.
